page.title: 06THE BUS
page.content: There is a bus service going to Oban.The bus goes to Oban twice a day except Sunday.The bus carries milk, papers and luggage.It leaves Dalavich in the morning at 7.45 a.m and comes back at 12.30 p.m . It goes out again at 2.45 p.m and returns at 5.15 p.m.It takes one hour from Dalavich to Oban but takes 2 hours coming back because of all the stops the driver needs to make.He has to get the papers and milk.Then makes deliveries on the way back.On Saturdays there is only one service.It leaves at 7.45.a.m and returns at 2.00.p.m.
